Text.Page:
It's not just trained animals with the nagas. They've hired mercenaries, too.

But you know what they say about mercenaries. There's a chink in the armor where the coins go in.

So take out their paymasters. Kill enough {@LinkCreature:10#11#naga slayers}, and I bet the mercenaries will evaporate.

Mercenaries in disarray? Excellent! On to phase two!

...once I write up phase two, that is.
It's simple: Take out the {@LinkCreature:10#11#naga slayers} and their mercenary underlings will start worrying about their coin-purses.
